mapper.select: SELECT c.name courseName, ta.id, ta.state, ta.course_id courseId, ta.gps, ta.class_id classId, ta.teacher_name teacherName, ta.teacher_id teacherId, ta.start_time startTime, ta.end_time endTime, ta.wifi_name wifiName, ta.wifi_pwd wifiPwd, ta.created, ta.updated FROM teacher_attence ta LEFT JOIN course c on ta.course_id = c.id WHERE ta.teacher_id = #{teacherId} ORDER BY updated DESC
